nodes.text: The Gamorrean mercenary Menugg lived in a village on his homeworld of Gamorr. While there, he made a name for himself as a powerful soldier with many victories under his belt and a record of great success with women. His reputation eventually drew the attention of several off-worlders, who traveled to the village and persuaded Menugg to leave Gamorr and work for them by showing him items and images from elsewhere in the galaxy.
Menugg's village was mentioned but not named in his entry in the 2004 Ultimate Adversaries, a supplemental book for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
